auth.emailInvalid: Biko tinye adreesị email ziri ezi
auth.passwordRequired: Okwuntughe ga-abụrịrị ihe odide 8 ma ọ bụ karịa

roleSelection.title: Kedu ka ị ga-esi jiri Fixit?
roleSelection.description: Họrọ etu ị ga-esi jiri FIXIT. Ị nwere ike ịgbanwe nhọrọ gị mgbe ọ bụla na ntọala profaịlụ gị.

vehicle_owner.title: Onye Nwe Ụgbọala
vehicle_owner.description: Maka nlekọta na nchekwa ụgbọala nke onwe.

fleet_manager.title: Onye Nlekọta Ụgbọala
fleet_manager.description: Iji jikwaa ma soro ọtụtụ ụgbọala.

mechanic.title: Onye Nrụzi
mechanic.description: Iji nata ma dozie arịrịọ nrụzi.

forgotPasswordScreen.title: Ị Chefuru Okwuntughe
forgotPasswordScreen.instruction: Tinye email gị iji tọgharịa okwuntughe gị. Anyị ga-ezitere gị OTP iji mepụta okwuntughe ọhụrụ.

stayConnectedScreen.title: Nọrọ njikọ ma dị njikere
stayConnectedScreen.description: Mee ka ngosi rụọ ọrụ iji nweta ngwa ọrụ na mmelite ọnọdụ, ma kwe ka ịnweta ebe iji mee ọrụ n'ebe ahụ yana ịhụ ebe nrụzi.

createNewPasswordScreen.title: Mepụta okwuntughe ọhụrụ
createNewPasswordScreen.instruction: Tinye okwuntughe siri ike iji chekwaa akaụntụ gị. Họrọ okwuntughe ị ga-echeta.
createNewPasswordScreen.resetFailed: Ichekwaba okwuntughe dara. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
createNewPasswordScreen.successDesc: Ị nwere ike ịbanye ugbu a na okwuntughe ọhụrụ gị.

uploadProfilePictureScreen.title: Bulite foto profaịlụ
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction: Tinye foto gị doro anya iji wulite ntụkwasị obi na ndị nwe ụgbọala na ndị njikwa ụgbọala. Foto profaịlụ na-enyere ndị ahịa aka ịmata gị ma mee ka profaịlụ gị pụta ìhè.
uploadProfilePictureScreen.uploadSuccess: E buliri foto profaịlụ nke ọma

verifyCodeScreen.verificationInstruction: Maka nchekwa gị, biko tinye koodu nọmba 4 anyị zigara na {{email}}
verifyCodeScreen.resetInstruction: Biko tinye koodu nọmba 4 anyị zigara na {{email}} iji tọgharịa okwuntughe gị
verifyCodeScreen.incompleteCodeError: Biko tinye koodu nọmba 4 zuru ezu
verifyCodeScreen.invalidCodeError: Koodu nkwenye ezighi ezi. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
verifyCodeScreen.resendTimerLabel: Ị nwere ike izighachi koodu na
verifyCodeScreen.codeResentSuccess: E zigara koodu nkwenye ọhụrụ na email gị
verifyCodeScreen.resendFailed: Izighachi koodu dara. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
verifyCodeScreen.modalSuccessDesc: E nwetala nkwenye email gị nke ọma. Ị nwere ike ịbanye ugbu a wee malite iji akaụntụ gị
